      • LVQPRU

        public LVQPRU(PrototypeSet _trainingDataSet,
              int numIter,
              double pcNpc,
              double pcN,
              int numIterLVQ2_1,
              double a,
              double w,
              int k)
        Builds a LVQPRU algorithm.
        Parameters:
        _trainingDataSet - Training dataset
        numIter - Number of iterations of the process.
        pcNpc - Percentage of number of prototypes per class. Used in initial reduction.
        pcN - Percentage of number of prototypes.
        numIterLVQ2_1 - Number iterations performed by the LVQ2.1 algorithm.
        a - Alpha parameter of the LVQ2.1 algorithm.
        w - Window width of the LVQ2.1 associated algorithm.
        k - K parameter of the LVQ2.1 algorithm.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        General main for all the prototoype generators Arguments: 0: Filename with the training data set to be condensed. 1: Filename wich will contain the test data set 3: k Number of neighbors used in the KNN function
